languages.text: "Какой еще в кракенову задницу товарищ?" {n}Ульфар недоумевающе пожимает плечами.{/n} "Я — потомок Всеотца, а он — мерзкий нелюдь. Сравни меня и нож из честной пластали, сломавшийся в руке гемункула — и то больше сходства найдется, чем с этим выродком. Пусть страдает — ты же видишь, что он не из простых, значит, успел совершить достаточно гнусностей за свою жизнь".

"Comrades? What in the kraken's arsehole are you talking about?" {n}Ulfar shakes his head, perplexed.{/n} "I am a descendant of the Allfather, and he is a vile inhuman. Compare me with a knife made of honest plasteel, broken in the Haemonculus's hand, and you will find more similarities than I have with this wretch. He can suffer — you can see that he is no commoner, so he has no doubt done his share of vile deeds in his life."
languages.original_text: "Какой еще в кракенову задницу товарищ?" {n}Ульфар недоумевающе пожимает плечами.{/n} "Я — потомок Всеотца, а он — мерзкий нелюдь. Сравни меня и нож из честной пластали, сломавшийся в руке гемункула — и то больше сходства найдется, чем с этим выродком. Пусть страдает — ты же видишь, что он не из простых, значит, успел совершить достаточно гнусностей за свою жизнь".

languages.text: 「仲間だと？クラーケンのケツの穴にいる奴が、お前の言うところの仲間なのか？」{n}ウルファーは困惑して首を振る。{/n}「俺は全知の父の子孫。こいつは悪辣な人ならざるものだ。純粋なプラスチール製ナイフを持つ俺と、ハモンキュラスの手にある壊れたナイフを比べてみろ。そうすれば、俺よりも多くの類似点が見つかるだろう。あんな奴は苦しめばいい…あれは只人ではない。生涯において卑劣な悪事を成した者であることが確実なことぐらいは分かる」
languages.original_text: "Comrades? What in the kraken's arsehole are you talking about?" {n}Ulfar shakes his head, perplexed.{/n} "I am a descendant of the Allfather, and he is a vile inhuman. Compare me with a knife made of honest plasteel, broken in the Haemonculus's hand, and you will find more similarities than I have with this wretch. He can suffer — you can see that he is no commoner, so he has no doubt done his share of vile deeds in his life."

traits.locale_text: 「仲間だと？クラーケンのケツの穴にいる奴が、お前の言うところの仲間なのか？」{n}ウルファーは困惑して首を振る。{/n}「俺は全知の父の子孫。こいつは悪辣な人ならざるものだ。純粋なプラスチール製ナイフを持つ俺と、ハモンキュラスの手にある壊れたナイフを比べてみろ。そうすれば、俺よりも多くの類似点が見つかるだろう。あんな奴は苦しめばいい…あれは只人ではない。生涯において卑劣な悪事を成した者であることが確実なことぐらいは分かる」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “难兄难弟？你在说什么海怪屁话？”{n}乌尔法困惑地摇摇头。{/n}“我是全父的子嗣，而他是个卑鄙的异形。就算是那把断在血伶人手里的塑钢刀，和这个卑鄙的家伙相比，都更像是我的难兄难弟。他很能扛，所以你能看得出来，他绝对不是什么小角色。也就是说，他肯定也干过什么坏勾当。”
languages.original_text: "Comrades? What in the kraken's arsehole are you talking about?" {n}Ulfar shakes his head, perplexed.{/n} "I am a descendant of the Allfather, and he is a vile inhuman. Compare me with a knife made of honest plasteel, broken in the Haemonculus's hand, and you will find more similarities than I have with this wretch. He can suffer — you can see that he is no commoner, so he has no doubt done his share of vile deeds in his life."

traits.locale_text: “难兄难弟？你在说什么海怪屁话？”{n}乌尔法困惑地摇摇头。{/n}“我是全父的子嗣，而他是个卑鄙的异形。就算是那把断在血伶人手里的塑钢刀，和这个卑鄙的家伙相比，都更像是我的难兄难弟。他很能扛，所以你能看得出来，他绝对不是什么小角色。也就是说，他肯定也干过什么坏勾当。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Compagnons ? Qu'est-ce que c'est que ces conneries ? » {n}Ulfar secoue la tête, perplexe.{/n} « Je suis un descendant du Père de Tous, tandis que lui n'est qu'un infâme non-humain. Vous me trouverez plus de points communs avec un couteau en plastacier usé entre les mains de l'hémoncule. Qu'il souffre. Un xénos de sa condition a certainement commis plus qu'assez d'actes odieux pour le mériter. »
languages.original_text: "Comrades? What in the kraken's arsehole are you talking about?" {n}Ulfar shakes his head, perplexed.{/n} "I am a descendant of the Allfather, and he is a vile inhuman. Compare me with a knife made of honest plasteel, broken in the Haemonculus's hand, and you will find more similarities than I have with this wretch. He can suffer — you can see that he is no commoner, so he has no doubt done his share of vile deeds in his life."

traits.locale_text: « Compagnons ? Qu'est-ce que c'est que ces conneries ? » {n}Ulfar secoue la tête, perplexe.{/n} « Je suis un descendant du Père de Tous, tandis que lui n'est qu'un infâme inhumain. Vous me trouverez plus de points communs avec un couteau en plastacier usé entre les mains de l'hémoncule. Qu’il souffre. Un xénos de sa condition a certainement commis plus qu’assez d’actes odieux pour le mériter. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «¿Camaradas? ¿Se puede saber qué cojones de kraken dice?». {n}Ulfar, perplejo, sacude la cabeza.{/n} «Yo desciendo del Padre de todas las cosas y él no es más que un vil inhumano. Compáreme con un cuchillo de plastiacero, roto a manos del Hemónculo, y a lo mejor así podría encontrarme más similitud que con ese desecho. Que sufra, ya ve que no es un cualquiera; seguro que se ha hartado de cometer fechorías».
languages.original_text: "Comrades? What in the kraken's arsehole are you talking about?" {n}Ulfar shakes his head, perplexed.{/n} "I am a descendant of the Allfather, and he is a vile inhuman. Compare me with a knife made of honest plasteel, broken in the Haemonculus's hand, and you will find more similarities than I have with this wretch. He can suffer — you can see that he is no commoner, so he has no doubt done his share of vile deeds in his life."

traits.locale_text: «¿Camaradas? ¿Se puede saber qué cojones de kraken dice?». {n}Ulfar, perplejo, sacude la cabeza.{/n} «Yo desciendo del Padre de todas las cosas y él no es más que un vil inhumano. Compáreme con un cuchillo de plastiacero, roto a manos del Hemónculo, y a lo mejor así podría encontrarme más similitud que con ese desecho. Que sufra, ya ve que no es un cualquiera; seguro que se ha hartado de cometer fechorías».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Kameraden? Was beim Arschloch des Kraken faselt Ihr da?" {n}Ulfar schüttelt perplex den Kopf.{/n} "Ich bin ein Nachkomme des Allvaters, er ist ein stinkender Nicht-Mensch. Vergleicht mich mit einem Messer aus ehrlichem Plaststahl, das in der Hand des Haemonculus geborsten ist ... und ihr werdet mehr Ähnlichkeiten als mit diesem Widerling. Er kann leiden ... Ihr könnt sehen, dass er kein Bürger ist, das heißt er hat in seinem Leben schon einiges verbrochen"
languages.original_text: "Comrades? What in the kraken's arsehole are you talking about?" {n}Ulfar shakes his head, perplexed.{/n} "I am a descendant of the Allfather, and he is a vile inhuman. Compare me with a knife made of honest plasteel, broken in the Haemonculus's hand, and you will find more similarities than I have with this wretch. He can suffer — you can see that he is no commoner, so he has no doubt done his share of vile deeds in his life."

traits.locale_text: "Kameraden? Was beim Arschloch des Kraken faselt Ihr da?" {n}Ulfar schüttelt perplex den Kopf.{/n} "Ich bin ein Nachkomme des Allvaters, er ist ein stinkender Nicht-Mensch. Vergleicht mich mit einem Messer aus ehrlichem Plaststahl, das in der Hand des Haemonculus geborsten ist ... und ihr werdet mehr Ähnlichkeiten als mit diesem Widerling. Er kann leiden ... Ihr könnt sehen, dass er kein Bürger ist, das heißt er hat in seinem Leben schon einiges verbrochen"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Yoldaş mı? Ne diyorsun sen kraken dokunacı boğasıca?" {n}Ulfar, şaşkınca başını sallıyor.{/n} "Ben Yücebaba'nın soyundan geliyorum, o ise alçak bir insan dışı. Beni Haimonkulus'un elinde kırılmış, doğru dürüst bir plasçelik bıçakla karşılaştırsan bu pislikten daha fazla benzerlik görürsün. Acısını çeksin. Sıradan biri olmadığı malum, ömrühayatında ne hurmalar yemiştir..."
languages.original_text: "Comrades? What in the kraken's arsehole are you talking about?" {n}Ulfar shakes his head, perplexed.{/n} "I am a descendant of the Allfather, and he is a vile inhuman. Compare me with a knife made of honest plasteel, broken in the Haemonculus's hand, and you will find more similarities than I have with this wretch. He can suffer — you can see that he is no commoner, so he has no doubt done his share of vile deeds in his life."

traits.locale_text: "Yoldaş mı? Ne diyorsun sen kraken dokunacı boğasıca? {n}Ulfar şaşkınca başını sallıyor.{/n} "Ben Yücebaba'nın soyundan geliyorum, o ise alçak bir insan dışı. Beni Haimonkulus'un elinde kırılmış, doğru dürüst bir plasçelik bıçakla karşılaştırsan bu pislikten daha fazla benzerlik görürsün. Acısını çeksin. Sıradan biri olmadığı malum, yaşamı boyunca yediği hurmalar vardır elbet."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
